msg: Disable HSQLDB block (not used by Lenya)

author: dgaudet
msg: Papa Roy said I could commit this.  Fix USE_PTHREAD_SERIALIZED_ACCEPT, I
totally didn't do it right the first time.

author: fielding
msg: Document change to USE_FCNTL_SERIALIZED_ACCEPT on Solaris2.

author: fielding
msg: USE_PTHREAD_SERIALIZED_ACCEPT results in locking problems when the
child that has the current lock gets killed by the parent.  Restore
USE_FCNTL_SERIALIZED_ACCEPT as the default for Solaris2, at least
until we get one of the other locking mechanisms to work reliably.
